title: LinkFreePlus Analytics
description: The Analytics configuration file for a LinkFreePlus instance.

redirectName.description: A common name to represent the redirect configuration.

redirectPath.description: The local URI path, that will initiate the redirect.

redirectHref.description: The URI path to the remote resource.

redirectDelay.description: In seconds, the amount of time to elapse before the redirect initiates.

redirectActive.description: A boolean representing whether or not the redirect should be active.
